name: STEEL LOVE: Galaxy Climax
description:
Singuliera returns!

The continuation of the young adult light novel series from 1994, (that never actually existed), STEEL LOVE, now for your home pc! Take control of the Gigantimus Mech Suit and explore the galaxy! Make friends, defeat enemies, and maybe even find love? Adventure and drama await in this thrilling new chapter in the beloved, (again, nonexistent), franchise!
